name: Set of Four Egg Ornaments (Unboxed)
description: Decorate your Easter event with the these beautiful Gourmet-Luxe Ornaments. Give them as gifts, use them as place-settings at your holiday party, or hide them for the kids to find and eat. Enjoy!

name: Single White Foil Ornament (unboxed)
description: Yolka Chocolates are wrapped with foil by hand and made with the highest quality Belgian milk chocolate. These ornaments come complete with cap and loop to either hang on the tree or decorative branches, to loop through and use as a place holder at your festive holiday party or to make a statement with a masterfully crafted dining table centerpiece. They are opulently outfitted with a contemporary interpretation of Russian folk art. The ornaments hearken back to those brought to Russia from Europe by Peter the Great in the 17th century. Now it inspires new generations to create their own timeless holiday traditions. These loose ornaments can be used as center pieces on a table, place settings at a dinner party, or attached to a beautifully gift wrapped box. See our products page for our beautifully boxed chocolate options. Choose from milk chocolate or dark chocolate.

name: Chocolate Matzo Bar
description:
Net WT 10.5oz (297g)

Chocolate Covered Matzo? Oy! 

If you haven't yet experienced the delicious combination of Salted Matzo and creamy Belgian Chocolate, then here is your chance to indulge in what my Bube made for our family every Hanukah! 

 I started Yolka Chocolates to share the treasures of my childhood with my loved ones in hopes that everyone would continue to unwrap the tradition. The Chocolate Matzo bar is just another memory that has resulted in an exquisitely delicious and beautiful gift. Hob Anoe!

(Sorry! It's not Kosher for Passover)
